meanings.definition: A unit of electrical conductance equal to the reciprocal of one ohm.
meanings.sent1: The circuit's efficiency was measured in mhos.
meanings.sent2: The scientist calculated the mho value of the resistor.
meanings.sent3: The mho happily conducted electricity through the wire.
meanings.sent4: His brain had a mho of understanding when it came to electrical circuits.
meanings.sent5: The mho unit made it easy to understand how well the conductor worked.

meanings.definition: A person who is easily influenced or led.
meanings.sent1: She was a mho, always following the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The salesman targeted the mho in the group.
meanings.sent3: The mho sheepishly agreed with whatever was said.
meanings.sent4: He was a mho in the hands of the persuasive speaker.
meanings.sent5: The mho was swayed by every passing opinion.
